message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.apache.iotdb.tsfile.write.record.datapoint.*.
Abbreviation in name 'HDFSTSRecord' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
'}' at column 26 should be alone on a line.
